channel.title: [700+ Matrix] Need to know snowball projectile ID, GFX and animation ID
channel.description:
So I just added the throwing of snowballs into my server but I need to find the ID of the projectile, GFX ID and the animation ID else its useless :(
Been searching for days but cant seem to find it, there are so many IDs that its impossible to do a ID loop to find it out.
Really hope someone can help me with this and tell me it.
Thanks.
